## Change Type

<!-- ðŸ’¡ Indicate the type of change your pull request is. -->
<!-- ðŸ¤·â€â™€ï¸ If you're not sure, don't select anything -->

<!-- To select one, put an x in the box: [x] -->

- [ ] `patch` â€” Bug Fix
- [ ] `minor` â€” New Feature
- [ ] `major` â€” Breaking Change

- [ ] `dependencies` â€” Dependency Update (publishes a `patch` release, for devDependencies use `internal`)

- [ ] `documentation` â€” Changes to the documentation only (will not publish a new version)
- [ ] `tests` â€” Changes to any testing-related code only (will not publish a new version)
- [ ] `internal` â€” Any other changes that don't affect the published package (will not publish a new version)
